ygData.subject: Re: Looking for spellcomponents
ygData.msgSnippet: For those that missed it I am on Cazic Thule. Here is the complete list, as it is known so far, of words and spell components used by Magicians. Words Needed:
ygData.messageBody:
For those that missed it I am on Cazic Thule. Here is the complete list, as
it is known so far, of words and spell components used by Magicians.

Words Needed:

Words of the Element
Words of Tyranny
Words of Dominion
Words of Transcendence
Words of Sight
Words of Coersion
Words of Duress
Words of Detection
Words of Incarceration
Words of Bondage
Words of Collection

Components:
Blood of Velious
Breath of Solusek
Scent of Marr
Flame of Vox
Glove of Rallos Zek
Eyes of Serilis
Ice of Velious
Essence of Rathe
Tears of Prexus
Breath of Ro
Wing of Xegony

Eldran (Cazic Thule)
-----Original Message-----
From: TkAdam@... <TkAdam@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 7:11 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Looking for spellcomponents


>From: TkAdam@...
>
>In a message dated 7/20/99 8:07:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
>matthiesenm@... writes:
>
>> Thank you for you response. I am looking for any and all of them. I have
>> bought Ice of Velious but failed in my research. Any hints are
appreciated.
>> Let me know if you need a list of them. I need both words and
components.
>>
>> Eldran
>
>Words I sorta know. You need the ones I do not.
>
>Go ahead and give a list. I do not consider a list of components ... not
>attached to the spell that needs them a spoiler (though some may ... so go
>ahead and say spoiler in the title of the mail)
>
>Sonoroud Tomebinder
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>Why do WOMEN ASTRONAUTS have such BAD HAIRCUTS?
>What happens if you CLEAN your self-cleaning OVEN?
>The DR. has answers:<a href=" http://www.drscience.com/u ">Click</a>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research.
Please keep the emails on topic. Offensive remarks will not be tolerated,
no warnings. Apologies will be considered, but repeat offenders will be
banned permanently.
